Which of the following groups of sites were newly added as Ramsar sites in India, bringing the total to 89?
options: Sakkarakottai and Therthangal Bird Sanctuaries (Tamil Nadu), Khecheopalri Wetland (Sikkim), and Udhwa Lake (Jharkhand)
Harike Wetland (Punjab), Chilika Lake (Odisha), and Udhwa Lake (Jharkhand)
Chilika Lake (Odisha), Loktak Lake (Manipur), and Sambhar Salt Lake (Rajasthan)
Only Khecheopalri Wetland (Sikkim) and Udhwa Lake (Jharkhand)
answer: Sakkarakottai and Therthangal Bird Sanctuaries (Tamil Nadu), Khecheopalri Wetland (Sikkim), and Udhwa Lake (Jharkhand)
